articles.description: The cast for the new season 14 of The Real Housewives of New York City reboot has  been revealed!
articles.content:
The cast for the new season 14 of The Real Housewives of New York City reboot has been revealed! 
Andy Cohen announced the seven new ladies who will be taking over RHONY during the last night of the… [+9737 chars]
